caption: This is a review for take out. The good: Place was clean and the personnel had gloves and face mask. Overall pleasant attitude. The bad: parking not available. The mediocre: the food was fine. Not terrible, not great. We ordered Pad Thai, …
This place provides fantastic service as well as delicious food. My favourite restaurant in town. The food arrived quick and the prices are affordable. Highly recommended.

This place is doubtless one of the tastiest restaurants in the region. Always when I come to this place I am remarkably glad. They manage their high  standard service and the highest level of cooking  they give. You surely will enjoy this this place. Warmly  recommended.
This spot is worth a visit. They have big portions for fair rates. Constantly well kept and with awesome vibes. Highly recommended.
